lines.text: I'm certain that my creature will give you a demonstration of its virility that no human being could be capable of imagining. You will see, dear Doctor, and appreciate the immolation of the chosen virgin who, without realising it, will be sacrificing herself to science. Humph! Very Well...
Hmmm... you're very pretty. I can tell that you'll be appreciated.
She was chosen from the special batch.

So you must be one of those who refused to collaborate. Am I right? Well, now you'll finds out for yourself that we Germans aren't nearly as bad as we're painted, you know. Come on, don't be frightened. I only want you to experience a moment of intense pleasure.
[the prisoner screams as she is tossed into the cage]
What are you screaming for, you silly fool? After all, my creature's only showing you a little tenderness.

[Nude 'beast' man repeatedly assaulting naked female prisoner in cage]
Tell me, do you find the spectacle exciting, Private Schultz?
Yes, of course, who wouldn't be excited?

[Hard slap to his face!]
Spineless fools! A soldier of the Third Reich isn't supposed to get excited at any spectacle!

[Turns to female uniformed sidekick]
And you, how'd you find the experiment?
Excellent! I think you are a genius. You're wonderful, Dr. Kratsch.
